org.pojava.util

Class ReflectionTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pojava.util.ReflectionTool

  • public class ReflectionTool
extends Object
    The ReflectionTool class provides static methods for accessing an object's properties.
    Author:
    John Pile

      • accessors

        public static Accessors accessors(Class<?> type,
                  Set<String> getterProperties,
                  Set<String> setterProperties)
        Specify a subset of the getters and setters for a class.
        Parameters:
        type - class of object containing the desired accessors
        getterProperties - the set of property names to include as getters
        setterProperties - the set of property names to include as setters
        Returns:
        referenced getters and setters for a class

      • getterMethodDrilldown

                             String property)
                                      throws NoSuchMethodException
        Array of getter methods that drill down to a nested bean property
        Parameters:
        type - hold class of object containing the get accessors
        property - hold a reference to a bean property
        Returns:
        array of getter methods drilling down to a property
        Throws:
        NoSuchMethodException

      • getNestedValue

        public static Object getNestedValue(Method[] getters,
                    Object bean)
        Drill down to a nested bean property from predetermined methods.
        Parameters:
        getters - A trail of nested methods leading to the property.
        bean - Root bean
        Returns:
        Result from getter method represented by the inner-most nested property.

      • getNestedValue

        public static Object getNestedValue(String relativePath,
                    Object bean)
        Drill down to a nested bean property
        Parameters:
        relativePath - Property specifier for relative path starting at bean as the root node. Both property.property and ./xpath/to/property are interpreted.
        bean - Root bean
        Returns:
        Result from getter method represented by dottedShortName

      • propertyFor

        public static String propertyFor(Method method)
        Extract a property name from a Method. This requires that an accessor or mutator follows the naming convention, "getSomething", "setSomething", or "isSomething", and will return the property name "something", or null if not found.
        Parameters:
        method - Method
        Returns:
        Short property name found for the method (or null if not found)

      • propertyFor

        public static String propertyFor(String accessorName)
        Return the property name for a getter or setter name.
        Parameters:
        accessorName - Name of accessor method, typically "getSomething", "setSomething" or "isSomething".
        Returns:
        Property name derived from getter or setter name.

      • populateFromMap

        public static void populateFromMap(Object obj,
                   Map<String,Object> properties,
                   Map<String,Method> setters)
                            throws IllegalAccessException,
                                   InvocationTargetException
        Invoke any setters of an object whose properties are referenced in a map, passing the values of that map into their respective setters.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to mutate
        properties - Property values to populate into obj
        setters - Mapped setter methods
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException
        InvocationTargetException
